downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 Business Portal Upgrade Guide
downloadDescription: This guide explains how to upgrade to Business Portal 6.0 or 6.1 for Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013.
detailsSection:
This guide explains how to upgrade to Business Portal for Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013. Which guide you'll need depends on the version of SharePoint that you're using:
  • BusinessPortalUpgrade.pdf - Use this guide if you're running Business Portal 6.0 on SharePoint 2010.
  • BusinessPortalUpgrade6_1.pdf - Use this guide if you're running Business Portal 6.1 on SharePoint 2013.
systemRequirementsSection: • To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
